mapper.update: update line set score = #{score} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select t.id, t.title, t.travel_agency_id, s.logo_url as travelLogoUrl, s.title as travelAgencyName, t.hot_sell, t.start_province_id, t.start_city_id, t.cover_url, t.duration, t.refund_type, t.refund_describe, t.score, t.total_num, t.introduce, t.advance_day from line t left join travel_agency s on t.travel_agency_id = s.id where t.deleted = false and t.state = 1 and t.id = #{id}
